a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The estimated share of newborns who die or survive the first five years of life.
Share surviving first five years of life
Share dying in first five years
Data source: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (2024); Gapminder based on UN IGME & UN WPP
